sc.plugin2019

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.framework.plugins.RoundBasedGameInstance<sc.framework.plugins.Player>
      • sc.plugin2019.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    sc.api.plugins.IGameInstance

    public class Game
extends sc.framework.plugins.RoundBasedGameInstance<sc.framework.plugins.Player>
    Minimales Spiel als Basis für neue Plugins. Diese Klasse enthält die Spielelogik.

      • checkWinCondition

        public sc.shared.WinCondition checkWinCondition()
        Checks if a win condition in the current game state is met. Checks round limit and end of round (and playerStats). Checks if goal is reached.
